verbs.description: En route to his press conference on Tuesday afternoon , a day before Game 3 of the 2018 NBA Finals , James [V: was] informed of President Donald Trump uninviting the Super Bowl champion Philadelphia Eagles to the White House .

[ARGM-ADV: En route to his press conference on Tuesday afternoon] , [ARGM-TMP: a day before Game 3 of the 2018 NBA Finals] , [ARG1: James] was [V: informed] [ARG2: of President Donald Trump uninviting the Super Bowl champion Philadelphia Eagles to the White House] .

En route to his press conference on Tuesday afternoon , a day before Game 3 of the 2018 NBA Finals , James was informed of [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: uninviting] [ARG1: the Super Bowl champion Philadelphia Eagles] [ARG2: to the White House] .
